mainSequence.step: Collaborator asks GUI to check assigned tasks
GUI gets assigned entries from AgendaController
AgendaController retrieves and returns instance from Repositories
AgendaController retrieves and returns agenda from Repositories
AgendaController gets assigned entries from Agenda
GUI displays returned Entries to Collaborator
Collaborator asks GUI to filter entries by date or status
GUI filters entries by date and status using AgendaController
AgendaController filters entries by date and status in Agenda
AgendaController returns filtered entries to GUI
GUI displays updated entries to Collaborator
